metadata.title: Momentum Heat Data using ERS-1 and 2 (J-OFURO)

creators.name: Tokai University, School of Marine Science

metadata.description: To derive homogenous data with high resolution using analysis and satellite data for obtaining globally-covered fluxes between ocean and atmosphere.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To derive homogenous data with high resolution using analysis and satellite data for obtaining globally-covered fluxes between ocean and atmosphere.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: For scientific use only.  For publication use, reference data source and send copy to the source. See http://dtsv.scc.u-tokai.ac.jp/j-ofuro/ for more info.
